name: Language Tags (Preview)
overview: This plugin automatically adds language tags to the media. (Preview Channel)
description: This plugin automatically scans the libraries and adds language tags to the media items. The languages are extracted from the audio tracks. Media types covered are movies, tv shows / series and collections. THIS IS THE PREVIEW CHANNEL - Use for testing new versions before they go to stable.

versions.changelog:
⚠️ PREVIEW RELEASE - For testing only\n\n- Update build.yaml and manifest-preview.json for preview version 0.4.4.8-preview
- Bump version to 0.4.4.8
- fix: removed unuses manifest entries
- feat: add fallback for series where episodes have the seriesId as parentId instead of the seasonId refactor: reduce logging verbosity in LanguageTagsManager
- feat: enhance logging and handling for media sources and streams in LanguageTagsManager
- feat: improve video processing logic for audio and subtitle tags in LanguageTagsManager
- feat: enhance video processing logic for audio and subtitle tags in LanguageTagsManager, addresses #25
- refactor: optimize collection item retrieval in LanguageTagsManager, addresses #21
- feat: add checkboxes for Music Genre and Live TV channels in configuration, addresses #20
- fix: changed how movies are retrieved from collections, fixes #21
- fix: "Force full refresh for tv shows" triggering a complete refresh, fixes #17 fix: Change return statements to continue in library processing for null checks
- feat: Add non-media tagging functionality with configuration options
- Remove commas from language names to avoid tag splitting issue in Parental Control (#23)
- feat: Enhance language checkbox display with ISO codes and improve selected language chips
- feat: add silent movies to whitelist, addresses #22
